RN medicom you can also connect with me

now let's jump into this week's show my

can you briefly talk a little bit about
what prompted you to write that well
what prompted me was I've got Christian

you know everybody's got their viewpoint
whatever label you want to put on it
liberal conservative there's extremes
flying in my face on my newsfeed every

I was just thinking just you can't we

people are so much more complex and the

I mean those political parties they're
just trying to get votes and stuff
they're not taking time to give every

think somebody is there this person and
underneath that has the same dreams and

just this simple little issue but anyway
the story was when I was growing up I

started becoming aware of others
sexually I guess you could say I didn't
really ever feel attracted to boys I
always was really drawn to girls and
when I guess when I realized what that

and you know cuz oh you don't do that
and so I tried you know to be a good

and then when I was a teenager I was

you know I shared some things with her

was just a really really crazy time I

for you in seeking counseling about this
or did you just keep it all internal and
you didn't talk to anyone about it I

there's more mainstream

the people that I was attracted to
that's just what I pursued I didn't wear

and anytime anything Christian subject

through the door you could basically
like milky way galaxy kind of thing and

being like wow I feel even more so that

it's just that feeling when he's smiling

that's one of my most cherished memories
and it was just things like that where

homosexuality he can

he made me this way you know I mean I
